answers.answer: If you just had a vaginal ultrasound or if your dr did anything internal like a pap then it completely normal to spot a little. I bled huge clots at 8 weeks pregnant after having sex and it was the scaryest thing ever! Congrats on your pregnancy though and a big congrats on twins! That's so exciting! I wish you a happy healthy pregnancy :)

Thank you so much . As for thw spotting I really haven't had sex since I found out I was pregnant it just happen one the I was upset n I yelled at someone n then 5 min later I was bleeding bright red but only when wiping since the it just been brown blood but very lightly I been on bed rest since then trying to stay calm.
Congrats!  I'm 17 weeks with twins!  It's very exciting and stressful.  Try and rest and keep your feet up, it'll all be ok!
Thank you congrats on your twins too . Hopefully we deliver healthy babys

question: Hi I just recently found out im having twins 5 weeks 4days their still to small to see the actual babies but the two sacs are visable im so happy n nervous since I also havr diabetes my doctor told me to monitor my glucose so he can know what medication to give me I ho back monday . But I also been having some brown spotting my doctor said iy was old blood so idk I was wondering if it normal n if anyone been in a similar situation n how did go for yall?
title: twins :)
